feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Analytics Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP Analytics Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Story Report- Latest Position Record Retrieval
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am required to create a report that extracts specific Matrix Relationship data (for example: related position and related position incumbent etc.), maintained against positions.


When I start with Position as source table, the preview query does not display the most recent position data (historical position data is also being shown), resulting in inaccurate data from other related tables.

I would appreciate your assistance in determining how to retrieve the latest record of the position along with its associated data.

entry.title: Widget Margin feature in the 2025 Q3 update
entry.content:
Genuine question..

what on earth is the point of the widget margin feature?
If for example we want a widget within a panel to be 10px from the edge of the margin, surely you'd just set the widget layout values accordingly.

entry.title: SAC error message when deleting Change Log: Failed to parse response Correlation ID: XXX
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I have a model in SAC that it generates many change logs.
First system message was: You have used up 107.37% of your data change log capacity for model "XXX".
I am following the instructions of SAP note: 3639457 - SAC: Data Change Log, Audit Log Handling.

Security > Data Changes > Select a model > Select the filters.

After selecting the range for deletion, SAC returned a message: 
Failed to parse response Correlation ID: 25352647412841219018816626172092

I have Admin rights.

Any idea how to fix/delete it?

Thanks

Carlos

entry.title: No data retrieved using C_MarketSegmentQ2501 or 2CCFIMARKSEGMQ2501 in SAC
entry.content:
Hi experts , 

is there a reason because no data is retrieved using C_MarketSegmentQ2501 or 2CCFIMARKSEGMQ2501 in SAC?

I can use them on query browser in SAP but not in SAC.

Mandatory parameter are managed correctly but no data is retrieved.

Little confused..

Gildo

entry.title: I want to color the SAC input controls according to the situation.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

Is there a way to color-code the SAC input control options?
I want to color-code them according to their status, such as “selected,” “not selected,” and “unselectable.”

This is the image we are aiming for.
In this example,
Green: Selected.
Gray: Cannot be selected.
Colorless: Can be selected, but is not selected.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: I want to display the legend titles on the SAC chart.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

When displaying legends on SAC charts, is it possible to display the legend titles as well?

This is the image we want to achieve.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Cross Model Copy Data Action Different Hierarchy Levels
entry.content:
Hello,

I'm trying to copy Budget data from Tactical Model on Job Family Level to a different model on operational level. The operational model has Job Role with Property Job Family and has level based hierarchy Job Family -> Job Role where as tactical only has Job Family.

I'm using the cross model copy option. when I map the Job Family to job role I don't have an option to map Family to Family. instead what ends up happening is that the data is copied from Job family from tactical model to each job role in the operational model so I end up for example for 3 job roles with 3 of the same budget number. see image below. 

How do I handle this situation so that the budget from job family stops at job family level in operational instead of budget exploding x3 or x4 depending on leaf job roles? 

Thank you

entry.title: I want to change the background color when there is no value in the SAC table.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

In the SAC table, “-” is displayed when there is no value in a cell.
At the same time, is it possible to change the background color of the cell to gray?

The image on the right is the specific image I am aiming for.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Position of SAC input control check box
entry.content:
Hello Community,

In the SAC input control, checkboxes are displayed to the left of the text.
Is it possible to change the position of the checkboxes to the right of the text?

The right side of the image is an example of what we are aiming for.

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Select Conversions' do not display conversion rate 'P' in SAC
entry.content:
Dear SAP community,

Select Conversions' do not display conversion rate 'P' in SAC.

We have a live BW connection to SAC, created a model and story on top of BW query. But in tabular view -> 'Select Conversions' -> 'Currency conversion type' -> we only see Exchage rate (M) but not created Exchange rate (P) in the drop-down list.

I also tried to create a ZP* conversion type and assign this to query in 'conversions' tab. But then too no use. Kindly suggest how to see P rate in the drop down. 

Best Regards,

Govardhan

entry.title: SAC to ECC Data Retraction
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Can anybody please confirm if data retraction to SAP ECC from SAC is available ?

Our setup contain BW middleware but its not HANA its based on MSSQL and we are on NEO environment so we cant utilize the DES (Data Export Service).

Thank you.

entry.title: SAP Analytics Cloud xlsx export - appendix
entry.content: Hello, is it possible to modify settings of an xlsx data export? We need to have appendix as a default settings. It works for all of the stories, they have the appendix set as default, except one story for which it does not work. All the stories are in the optimized view mode. Is it somehow possible to adjust or modify the settings of the xlsx data export from a table?

entry.title: Calculated Measure Temporary creation - SAC for planning augmented analysis
entry.content:
Hello, 

I have a table in my story, and I want users to easily add calculated measures.
I’d like to create a checkbox, dropdown, or some other control that allows them to choose which dimensions they want to filter on, and then create the measure.
I also want this measure to disappear and be recreated whenever they need it.

Is that possible?
What should I use, and what would the code look like?

Thanks

entry.title: User ID for IAS users
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We provision users from Entra ID to IAS and then to cloud applications.

In the source system for Entra ID in IAS, we changed the default transformation code (user part):

Instead of:

 

 {
        "sourcePath": "$.userPrincipalName",
        "targetPath": "$.userName",
        "correlationAttribute": true
      },

we use:

{
  "sourcePath": "$.employeeId",
  "targetPath": "$.userName",
  "correlationAttribute": true
}

This way, the employee ID from Entra is provisioned to the Login Name field in IAS. When provisioning to the cloud application, a user is created with the employee ID as the user ID.

employeeId

Entra ID (employeeId) → Login Name (IAS) → User ID (SAC)

Problem:
Users created directly in IAS don’t have an employee ID, so the Login Name field in IAS is empty.

Question:
What can be used as the user ID in the cloud apps for users created directly in IAS?

 

Thank you very much for any tips

Best Regards

entry.title: I want to specify fonts for each level of the SAC table.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

This is a question about the font used to display hierarchies in SAC tables.
Is it possible to change the font settings for each hierarchy level?
For example, when displaying a three-level hierarchy, is it possible to display levels 1 and 2 in bold and level 3 (the lowest level) in non-bold?
Is it possible to display it as shown on the right side of the image below?

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Does SAC's bar graph have a grouping function?
entry.content:
Hello Community,

In SAC bar graphs, is it possible to group multiple measurement items for a single dimension item?

When using the grouping function, is it possible to narrow the bar spacing (yellow) when the dimensions are the same, or conversely, to widen the bar spacing (green) when the dimensions are different?
The image on the right shows what I am aiming for.

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Please tell me how to move the total column to the left in the SAC table.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

When you display the total column in the SAC table, it appears on the right side (top of the image).
Is there a way to display the total column on the left side, as shown at the bottom of the image?

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: About displaying and hiding SAC's “collaboration column and line” data labels.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

Is it possible to toggle the display of data labels for columns and lines separately in SAC's “collaboration column and line”?
The standard function allows you to toggle the display of data labels for both columns and lines, but
is there a way to display data labels for columns and not display data labels for lines?

For example, I want to hide the parts marked with yellow markers.

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: The direction of axis labels when there are multiple key items in a SAC chart.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

This is about “axis label direction” when using SAC's "Combination Column & Line" and "Bar/Column" charts.

If multiple measurement items are selected, changing the SAC standard setting item "axis label direction" will not cause the axis labels to be displayed diagonally.

Is it possible to display the axis labels diagonally?
If they are not displayed diagonally, the item names are abbreviated, making them very difficult to read.

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Is it possible to specify the grid interval for charts in SAC?
entry.content:
Hello Community,

In SAC charts, you can specify the maximum and minimum values of the axis as standard settings, but there does not appear to be a place to specify the interval between axes.
The interval is automatically determined by SAC.

 

 

Is there a way to achieve the following regarding the spacing between axes?
1. Specify the spacing between axes numerically.
2. Select the spacing between axes from options such as narrow, standard, or wide.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.
